settings.name: Movement speed threshold
settings.description: Define the speed threshold (in meters per hour) below which an animal is considered to be in parturition behavior. When set to null (default), the rolling average speed for each track will be automatically calculated and used as the threshold.

settings.name: Rolling window duration
settings.description: Specify the time window duration (in hours) for calculating rolling averages of movement metrics and identifying sustained low-movement periods. This value must be larger than your data's fix rate interval. Recommended: 72 hours for ungulates.

settings.name: Known parturition events file
settings.description: Upload a CSV file containing known parturition dates for validation and comparison. The file should contain columns 'track_id' and 'birthdate' (YYYY-MM-DD format). See documentation for detailed format requirements.

settings.name: Speed plot Y-axis limit
settings.description: Set the maximum value for the Y-axis in speed plots (in meters per hour). This helps standardize plot scales across different tracks for better visual comparison.

settings.name: Include elevation background
settings.description: Add elevation terrain as background in location plots. This provides geographic context but may increase processing time and require internet connectivity for elevation data retrieval.
